report.title: Locations list 2
report.description: A general purpose list of locations including option to filter by an intersecting point.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw on lw.location_id=l.id AND lw.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ttype ON ttype.id=l.location_type_id #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND l.deleted=false #order_by#

param.name: location_type_id
param.description: Select the location type, or leave blank to not filter by location type.

param.name: locattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of location attribute IDs to include
